rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the courtyard and north entrance, promoting natural light. Eco-friendly materials used.
Open dining space adjoining the living room, designed to enhance social interactions and allow ambient lighting from natural sources.
Compact yet functional kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, incorporating sustainable materials. Located near the courtyard for ventilation.
Small bathroom ensuring efficient water usage and proper drainage. Features a low-flow fixture to minimize consumption.
Utility space for storage, built with cost-effective materials while maintaining aesthetic consistency.

openings.description: North-facing entrance aligning with Vastu principles and maximizing natural light.
Floor-to-ceiling window overlooking the central courtyard to enhance eco-friendly design through maximum daylighting.
Internal doorways connecting living spaces designed for ease of movement and efficient use of space.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with eco-friendly insulation and built-in storage solutions, overlooking the courtyard for a serene view.
Second bedroom designed with sufficient natural light access, energy-efficient cooling techniques, and cost-effective construction materials.
Private bathroom for the master suite with water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly design elements.

openings.description: Stairs connecting ground floor to upper level designed with safety features and sustainable materials.
